components.name: HeroSection
components.description: RTL-optimized hero section featuring a professional barber shop atmosphere with headline, description, and prominent booking CTA

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Showcase of professional barber services with descriptions, pricing, and visual elements

components.name: BookingSystem
components.description: Interactive appointment booking system with calendar, time selection, and service options

components.name: PortfolioGallery
components.description: Visual showcase of the barber shop's work with filterable categories and image lightbox

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: Company story and values section with team introduction and experience highlights

components.name: TestimonialsCarousel
components.description: Dynamic carousel showcasing customer reviews and ratings

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Accordion-style frequently asked questions with expandable answers

components.name: ContactSection
components.description: Contact form and business information with map integration

components.name: Footer
components.description: Site footer with navigation, social links, and copyright information

components.name: NavigationHeader
components.description: Responsive header with logo, navigation menu, and booking CTA button

components.name: SpecialOffersSection
components.description: Highlighted special deals, promotions or membership options

components.name: InstagramFeed
components.description: Dynamic Instagram feed showcasing the barber shop's latest posts

components.name: ExpertiseSection
components.description: Highlighted special skills and expertise areas of the barber shop

components.name: LocationSection
components.description: Business location information with map, directions, and parking details

components.name: CTASection
components.description: Bold call-to-action section encouraging appointment booking
